ARABIC: إِن تُبْدُوا۟ خَيْرًا أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ أَوْ تَعْفُوا۟ عَن سُوٓءٍ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّا قَدِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Whether you reveal a good act or keep it hidden, or pardon an evil act, Allah is Ever-Pardoning, All- Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Whether you do some good openly or in secret, or forgive an ill done to you, (know) that God is forgiving and all-powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Even though you have the right to speak evil if you are wronged), if you keep doing good -whether openly or secretly -or at least pardon the evil (then that is the attribute of Allah). Allah is All-Pardoning and He has all the power to chastise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whether you act virtuously, in public or in private, or pardon (people's) faults, God is All-forgiving and All-powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: If you do any good openly or in secret, or pardon someone’s evil – then indeed Allah is Oft Forgiving, Able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Whether you disclose a good deed or conceal it, or pardon an evil, verily, Allah is Ever Pardoning, All-Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: If you do good openly or do it in secret or pardon an evil then surely Allah is Pardoning, Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If you do good openly or in secret or pardon an evil, surely God is All-pardoning, All-powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If ye do good openly or keep it secret, or forgive evil, lo! Allah is ever Forgiving, Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Whether you reveal any good or hide it, or pardon any evil, God is forgiving and all powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Whether ye disclose a good or conceal it, or pardon an evil, then verily Allah is ever Pardoning potent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Whether you disclose a good [deed that you do] or hide it, or excuse an evil [deed], Allah is indeed all-excusing, all-powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Whether ye publish a good deed or conceal it or cover evil with pardon, verily Allah doth blot out (sins) and hath power (in the judgment of values).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Whether you (mankind) disclose (by good words of thanks) a good deed (done to you in the form of a favour by someone), or conceal it, or pardon an evil,  verily, Allah is Ever Oft­Pardoning, All­Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If you display good or hide it, or pardon an evil, surely, Allah is the Pardoner, the Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If you let a good deed be shown, or conceal it, or pardon an offense—God is Pardoning and Capable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: If [instead] you show [some] good or conceal it or pardon an offense - indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Competent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:149] If you show, manifest, good, in the way of pious deeds, or conceal it, [if] you do it in secret, or pardon evil, injustice, then surely God is ever Pardoning, Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (If ye do good) if you answer in a good manner (openly or keep it secret) and not be contemptuous, (or forgive evil) or overlook a transgression, (lo! Allah is Forgiving) of the person who has been wronged, (Powerful) to punish the transgressor.
